content: **finished measurements** circumference 26¾ height 12 not including straps **skills/techniques used in this pattern ** chain single and double_crochet stitches single_crochet 2 stitches together changing colors working in the round working in back loop **pattern notes** this bag is worked from the bottom up in rounds join all rounds with a slip_stitch to change colors insert hook in joining chain drop current color and pick up next color pull through chain and loop on hook to complete a slip_stitch with new color
